about_the_game:
Artificial Wallpaper is an app created to daily update your wallpaper with a brand new picture.
Your wallpaper will be created with Artificial Inteligence and you will only be able to see this image a single day. Tomorrow, you will see a complete new picture.
Yes, only one day! (actually, you can change this interval. Don't worry)
This way your wallpaper will never get bored and you never know what to expect from the next day.


Quick tip: please backup your current wallppaper on first use if you want to use it again (we hope you don't).

Quick FAQ:

Q: Can I save today's wallpaper?
A: Sure. Save and share with your friends! But unfortunately, we still don't have a button for this, so you will need to get the image from Windows (tip. search for "windows get current wallpaper location")

Q: I pressed the button but nothing happened, what should I do?
A: Make sure you are connected to the internet. Also, did you already changed your wallpaper today? Remember: the idea of the app is a daily wallpaper.

Q: Can I change my wallpaper multiple times a day?
A: No. The idea of the app is to you get a new wallpaper every day. If you don't like today's image, don't worry, you can change in the next morning.

name: Artificial Wallpaper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 32 or 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: 32 or 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Artificial Wallpaper is an app created to show you a brand new wallpaper everyday. All you need to do is download it, run, click "Update Wallpaper" and it's done.
